#Quick Sports Analysis in R

##by Ian Riaf

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(error = TRUE)
```

**Part 1 ** 

```{r}

load(file="SportsData.RData")
summary(SportsData)
plots(SportsData$`P2+`,SportsData$`P50+`)
model = lm(SportsData$`P2+~SportsData$`P50+`)
summary(model)
```

**Part2**

```{r}
plot(SportsData$`P2+`,SportsData$`P34-49`)
boxplot(SportsData$`P2+`)
boxplot(SportsData$`P34-49`)

```

The mean of P2+ Viewership was 'r mean(SportsData.RData$`P2+`).
